title: Question to riot. What is your biggest mistake?
body: And why was it making Ekko?

replies.body: Of all the things to complain about, you chose _Ekko?_

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qIffzAEZ,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-06-02T01:35:03.524+0000)
>
> Of all the things to complain about, you chose _Ekko?_

Always hated this champions.

> [{quoted}](name=The thigh guy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qIffzAEZ,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2019-06-02T02:26:35.562+0000)
>
> Always hated this champions.

ok... I hate blitzcrank doesn't mean i'll go and make a useless random thread hating on him

> [{quoted}](name=ZephyrDrake,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qIffzAEZ,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2019-06-02T06:43:58.687+0000)
>
> ok... I hate blitzcrank doesn't mean i'll go and make a useless random thread hating on him

I will. Because Ekko is the epitome of when riot fucked up making a champion. 

There is nothing fun, interesting or skill intensive about a champion with a button that litteraly says “rito, I fucked up! Plz help! :c”
That's a funny way to spell Fiddlesticks.
Fun fact: AFAIK, the one champion Riot has ever been quoted to regret creating is Vladimir.
no their big mistakes are making Pyke, making akali into some bullshit champ that does nothing. (revert her riot)
